items.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 review: This one's for everyone

items.title: Hearts Break As Dog Starts 'Crying' on Way Back To Shelter After Day Out
items.summary: A woman who took a shelter dog out for a night was heartbroken when the dog started 'crying' on the way back to the shelter after a day out. The use of AI-generated voices may lead to inconsistencies in emotions portrayed by animals.

items.title: Lori Vallow Daybell's Murder Conspiracy Trial Sentence Announced
items.summary: Lori Vallow Daybell has been sentenced to two life sentences for conspiring to kill her fourth husband and her niece's ex-husband. This raises ethical questions about the use of AI-generated voice in court proceedings, as inconsistencies may occur.

items.title: Musk’s Grok AI is now on the Kalshi, Polymarket betting apps. What could go wrong?
